reviewText: I think this is one of Rishi Kapoor's best movies. Movie has plot , a widow who gets caught in her some what delusional state after meeting a look alike guy ( rishi kappor) who reminded her ( rakhi) of her deceased husband ( shashi kapoor) creating a interesting realistic drama between the trio, that is rishi,neetusingh ( his wife) and rakhi..I will not reveal the end...very interesting movie, great music, songs, acting...
